About Me.

Hello there! I am Mohammed, welcome to my blog. I am an engineer that likes to work on challenging problems

What I do currently

Currently, I am working as a Co-founder at Pixeldust Technologies where I look into multiple areas in tech spanning from Backend engineering to Machine/Deep Learning to DevOps.

About Pixeldust

We work with all sizes of companies either Fortune 500 or early-stage startups to help them build their tech platforms and products with modern, robust, and state-of-the-art tools and technologies.

We help our clients with plug-and-play teams right from Day1 so we can get help them get started and they can focus on their business growth rather than worrying about technological capabilities and challenges

Why this blog?

I believe teaching is the best way of learning and diving deeper into concepts. This blog serves as a notes app or living documentation about stuff I am learning/experiencing over time, so you could find me revisiting the content and updating it as needed.
I hope people find the content interesting and helpful in their tech journey. Another reason is I also wanted to improve my writing skills and couldnâ€™t have found a better way of doing so without this blog, so here we are!

Tech Stack

Over the past 7 years, I have worked across different areas of computer science like Web development, Data science, Machine learning, Backend engineering, Systems design and architecture, DevOps, etc. Below is an overview of the tools/technologies/framework that I work with or have worked with in past.

Frontend: HTML, CSS, Javascript, VueJS, Typescript

Backend: Python, Django, Django Rest Framework, NGINX, Celery, Redis, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, GraphQL

Machine Learning: Pandas, Numpy, Keras, PyTorch, Rest APIs

DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, CI/CD, Azure DevOps

You can find some of my work in the above areas here on Github

Other Interests

I am a big time sports junkie and I spend my weekends either watching sports or playing.
